official_title: Integrating Use of Self-Affirmation Content Into a Mobile App to Promote Quit Attempts With Text-Based Smoking Cessation Intervention Messaging
inclusion_criteria:
* INCLUSION/EXCLUSION:
* Because the app is designed to assist with smoking cessation, all smokers are eligible to participate.
* Subjects are eligible if they are 18+ years of age.
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 99 Years
